wikipedia_page.main: Isabel Turner (April 6, 1936 – October 26, 2021) was a British-born Canadian politician, who was Mayor of Kingston, Ontario from 2000 to 2003. She served as a board member of the St. Lawrence Parks Commission of the Ontario Ministry of Tourism and Culture between 2006 and 2012.Turner died of pneumonia at Kingston General Hospital on October 26, 2021, at the age of 85.

response: * Isabel Turner (1936–2021), Canadian politician, was born in Kingston

response: Bennett was unsuccessful when he ran for re-election in 2000, losing a highly contested election to the popular former reeve of Kingston Township, Isabel Turner. The persistent difficulties faced by the new city’s first post-amalgamation government were considered a determining factor in the election outcome.Kingston Whig Standard November 14th, 2000
